MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley, affecting properties in Queens Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:06am. Engineers are making progress with repairs to our underground electricity network on Queen Street and we still expect all power to be restored by midday. We understand that to be without power is frustrating and we apologise for this. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:55am on the 29th of January 2021
